transcript: I stopped taking matte-forming because it makes me D.C.

result.recommended_next_step: Pharmacist outreach within 24 hours to address side-effect concern and adherence barrier.
result.safe_patient_reply: Please wait for the pharmacist's follow-up phone call. They will discuss your concerns and provide further guidance.

soap_note.subjective: Patient stopped taking matte-forming due to side effect.
soap_note.assessment: Patient is experiencing a side effect due to medication.
soap_note.plan: Follow-up with pharmacist for further assessment.

pharmacist_task.summary: Patient stopped taking matte-forming due to side effect, require follow-up.
